arts.ttl: Brighton vs. Newcastle – Eddie Howe: Pre-Match Press Conference
arts.sum: Newcastle United visit Brighton & Hove Albion on Saturday in a mid-table Premier League contest between two sides level on points after seven matches. Eddie Howe’s team enters the fixture on the back of a 2-0 win over Nottingham Forest in which feels like a thousand years ago, while Brighton earned a late draw against […]

arts.ttl: Newcastle United XI vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Newcastle United travel to their ultimate bogey ground today. They face Brighton at the Amex Stadium, a venue where they have remarkably never won in the Premier League. Adding to the challenge, Eddie Howe’s side are also looking to end a worrying four-match goal drought away from home in the league. Although the Magpies have […] The post Newcastle United XI vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Brighton vs Newcastle United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion will look to extend their remarkable unbeaten home record against Newcastle United this afternoon. The two sides meet in a mid-table Premier League clash at the Amex Stadium, a ground where the Magpies have never won. Furthermore, Newcastle arrive in the midst of a worrying goal drought on the road. arts.ttl: Brighton vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton welcome Newcastle United to the Amex Stadium this afternoon for a fixture that has historically become their most favourable in the Premier League. Impressively, the Seagulls have never lost a home game against the Magpies in eight top-flight attempts. Consequently, they will be full of confidence as they look to extend that remarkable record. arts.ttl: Brighton vs Newcastle: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 8, 2025
arts.sum: Brighton had ten members of the first team squad away from the club over the international break, with midfielder Yasin Ayari pairing up with magpies winger Anthony Elanga in the Sweden squad, alongside former toon striker Alexander Isak, whose final Newcastle goal came at this ground when the teams met in May. Woltemade, who scored his first senior goal for Germany against Northern Ireland on Monday, was one of seven senior toon players to represent their countries in the recent international break, with Anthony Gordon also on the scoresheet, netting the first goal in England's 5-0 victory against Latvia.
